welcome.top: Bass Station wishes you all a
ticker: Return (from the beyond) every Saturday night for (mostly) living DJs!
Haunt our Discord and the VRChat group for the latest updates!

event.top: Going bump in the night at...
ticker: Don't become a desiccated husk just yet, remember to hydrate often~!
We've moved on to a better place.... Bluesky! Follow us @bassstationvr.bsky.social
Haunt our Discord and the VRChat group for the latest updates!

performers.name: Mellow
ticker: First train, calling at Midtempo!
If you are suffering from Deja Vu, yes it is 1AM again. Don't worry, you're just in the UK (sorry) and the clocks have gone back again.

performers.name: Bassdrop
ticker: Prepare to depart this world... on platform 2 for this train calling at Drum And Bass.
'Remember, no man is a failure who has friends.'
Follow me on Twitter @CeleronTheProto & Bluesky @celerontheprotogen.bsky.social

performers.name: A.V.E.S. Protocol
ticker: The delayed 11AM train is now arriving and calling at House only.
'Hold birb gentle like hamburger'
Follow Aves on Twitter at @DJ_Aves_ or Bluesky @dj-aves.bsky.social

performers.name: V[AI]RUS
ticker: Your final chance to escape... calling at Frenchcore and Uptempo.
*dial-up noises* 'processing...'
Follow V[AI]RUS on Twitter @v_ai_rus and Bluesky @vairus.bsky.social

performers.name: **TERMINATES HERE**
ticker: This event terminates here. Goodnight out there..... whatever you are~
See you all next week as we try and clean up all this blue goop.
All passengers are reminded to not smooch the werewolves without asking first, thank you.
Please ensure your entire soul is contained within the train car before the doors close to avoid accidents.
We've moved on to a better place.... Bluesky! Follow us @bassstationvr.bsky.social
